kw.name: Location Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current URL contains `expected`.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

test.status:
Several failures occurred:
1) Location should have contained 'http://s1.web.sumdu.edu.ua:8080/login.jsp' but it was 'http://s1.web.sumdu.edu.ua:8080/pages/registration.xhtml'.
2) Page should have contained text 'You have successfully registered' but did not
